text: Loop Head (),Ceann Léime, Irish Placenames Database. Retrieved: 2010-08-13.Parish of Kilballyowen (b), Ordnance Survey Letters by John O'Donovan and Eugene Curry, 1839. Clare County Library. Retrieved: 2010-08-13Clare Topography, A Topographical Dictionary of Ireland by Samuel Lewis, 1837. LibraryIreland.com. Retrieved: 2010-08-13 is a headland on the north side of the mouth of the River Shannon, in County Clare in the west of Ireland. Loop Head is marked by a prominent lighthouse. The opposite headland on the south side of the Shannon is Kerry Head. The Shannon Foynes Port Company controls navigation in the Shannon estuary and river. Loop Head peninsula, has the Atlantic Ocean on one side and the Shannon Estuary on the other, with barely a mile of land saving it from island status. In 2010, the Loop Head peninsula was awarded a European Destinations of Excellence Award, which is an EU accolade for emerging tourism destinations which are developing in a responsible and sustainable manner.Proposed suspension bridge would link Bishop's Island with Clare coast In 2013, Loop Head was named the "Best Place to Holiday in Ireland" by The Irish Times, and was shortlisted in the Best Destination category at the World Responsible Tourism awards. The Loop Head Peninsula is the only Irish destination listed in the 2014 Global Sustainable Top 100 Destinations and in 2015 took the Gold medal at the Irish Responsible Tourism Awards. Part of the film Star Wars: The Last Jedi was filmed at Loop Head.https://www.clareecho.ie/new-trailer-star-wars-movie-featuring-loop-head/ The head has a giant "Eire" sign left over from World War 2 during The Emergency in Ireland.https://www.irishtimes.com/culture/heritage/the-second- world-war-éire-sign-rescued-from-a-dublin-cliffside-1.3879269 ==Gallery== File:Loop Head - geograph.org.uk - 12618.jpg | Diarmuid and Gráinne's Rock or Lover's Leap File:Loop Head, Lighthouse, County Clare - geograph.org.uk - 56065.jpg | Lighthouse File:Aillnagreagh, Loop Head - geograph.org.uk - 1088809.jpg | Aillnagreagh ==See also== * List of lighthouses in Ireland ==References== ==External links== *Awarded "EDEN - European Destinations of Excellence" non traditional tourist destination 2010 *Commissioners of Irish Lights Category:Headlands of County Clare Category:Lighthouses in the Republic of Ireland Category:Lighthouses on the National Inventory of Architectural Heritage
title: Loop Head
